scripts.setup: npm run setup:win --if-present || npm run setup:unix
scripts.postbuild: node -e "if (process.platform === 'win32') { require('child_process').execSync('node copy_dist.js', {stdio: 'inherit'}) } else { require('child_process').execSync('mkdir -p ../dist && rm -rf ../dist/_internal ../dist/ArkAnalyzer-HapRay && cp -a dist/ArkAnalyzer-HapRay/_internal ../dist/ && cp -a dist/ArkAnalyzer-HapRay/ArkAnalyzer-HapRay ../dist/', {stdio: 'inherit'}) }"
